title: Mainland slams Taiwan's DPP for squandering public money to pursue secessionist goal
description: A Chinese mainland spokesperson on Wednesday criticized Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) authorities for squandering public money to pursue their secessionist goal.
content:

(Xinhua) 10:28, December 04, 2025
